programme.title: Hot Door Night S1 Ep2074
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness S1 Ep193
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan S1 Ep5232
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kong's ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Prosecutor, The
programme.desc: Based on a true case, young Ma Jia Jie pleads guilty to drug trafficking in exchange for a lighter sentence, as coerced by his defense lawyer. Huo Zi Hao, a former cop turned prosecutor, believes in his innocence and launches an investigation. Risking his life and career, Huo is determined to uncover the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Fly Me to the Moon
programme.desc: New Hong Kong immigrants Yuan and her sister face identity crises, poverty, and their father's drug addiction. Initially, the sisters attempt to appease him, but as they enter adolescence, they ultimately rebel and escape. Even as they separate from their father, Yuan finds his traits mirrored in her loved ones.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kong's legendary detective?

programme.title: MuMu
programme.desc: Mumu, a cheerful seven-year-old girl, lives with her deaf father in a deaf community and connects him to the outside world. However, their peaceful life is disrupted when her estranged mother reappears, pushing Mumu into the hearing world. Meanwhile, her father becomes ensnared by a gang that exploits the deaf to commit crimes.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang's first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt's puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: A group of bounty hunters, including San, Yo, Cat, Swan and Bobo, are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings that have plagued an international hotel group. Unfortunately, Swan, Cat and Bobo are kidnapped by the mastermind of the bombings. Can San and Yo save them? Will the bounty hunters accomplish their mission?

programme.title: Hello Stranger
programme.desc: This is a Thai romantic comedy. The story portrays a young Thai man and woman who meet by coincidence while on vacation in South Korea. They decide to tour the country together while keeping their names a secret from each other. From unwillingly at first, then become best friends and fall in love finally.

programme.title: My Best Bet
programme.desc: Gambling addict Jing vows to quit after marrying anti-gambling advocate Zheng. However, wealthy gambler Ian nurses a long-held grudge against Zheng over a past humiliation and exacts revenge by taking the couple's siblings hostage. To save them, Jing breaks her vow and alongside Zheng, faces Ian in a final gamble.

programme.title: Time Still Turns the Pages
programme.desc: High school teacher Cheng recalls his violent childhood memories when he finds an anonymous suicide note in the classroom. While he has to prevent the tragedy involving a suicidal student from happening, he also has to face a series of family problems with his wife wanting to divorce him and his father's serious illness.

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: Dead Talents Society
programme.desc: Newbie ghost Rookie must fight to prove herself in the afterlife, where spirits are required to deliver spectacular scares to earn their place. Facing the threat of vanishing if she fails to secure a haunting license, she teams up with a washed-up ghost diva and her spectral agent, who train her to become the next star and stage the world's greatest fright.

programme.title: From Beijing With Love
programme.desc: Stephen Chow writes, directs & stars in this hilarious James Bond spoof that sees the Chinese government assign their worst secret agent (Chow) to recover a stolen dinosaur skull.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80's, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition - to live the American dream.

programme.title: Operation Mekong
programme.desc: After it is discovered that the drugs seized on the Chinese ships had been planted by the henchman of a notorious drug cartel leader named Naw Khar, the governments of Thailand, Laos, Myanmar and China launched a joint task force to apprehend the criminal by sending a band of elite narcotics officers to the Golden Triangle to uncover the truth.

programme.title: Wish Comes True
programme.desc: Xiao Fei is a cheerful girl who has been abandoned by her mother. One day, she encounters a gifted young man named Zi Wai, who is battling a rare disease. Determined to help him, she embarks on a journey to find his lost love. Even when they discover that the drug treating Wai is ineffective, they choose to embrace hope and love together.

programme.title: Detective vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Dead Talents Society
programme.desc: Newbie ghost Rookie must fight to prove herself in the afterlife, where spirits are required to deliver spectacular scares to earn their place. Facing the threat of vanishing if she fails to secure a haunting license, she teams up with a washed-up ghost diva and her spectral agent, who train her to become the next star and stage the world's greatest fright.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Evan, Johnny, and Irwin are best friends. All three of them get dumped by their girlfriends one day and decide to find three robotic substitutes, the iGirls, as their new girlfriends. However, as time goes by, Evan finds himself falling in love with his iGirl

programme.title: Fist of Legend
programme.desc: When Chen Zhen studies in Japan, he finds several Chinese students missing and accidentally uncovers the Black Dragon Society's conspiracy. A new drug is invented to boost bodies of the Japanese troops in war and the Chinese students are used in their experiments. Chen Zhen vows to take down the evil society and destroy their secret laboratory.

programme.title: Once in a Blue Moon
programme.desc: Mei Zhen's family appears to get along but harbours deep secrets. Mei Zhen is trapped in a dead-end job with a toxic boss, her brother hides his separation and their mother grapples with lingering guilt over her husband's departure years ago. As Mid-Autumn Festival approaches, can the family heal their wounds and find a way back to each other?

programme.title: The Monkey King 3
programme.desc: Monkey King, Pigsy and Sandy escort Monk Tang to retrieve the scriptures and accidentally head into the mysterious Female Kingdom. The Queen falls in love with Monk Tang at first sight, but her advisor orders Monk Tang and his disciples to be executed. As the four attract the appearance of River Spirit, the Female Kingdom is plunged into crisis!

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend's baby...

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: After avenging his father's death by assassinating a high official, Li Yue disappears into hiding as a fugitive. His fiance enlists a swordsmanwho secretly loves herto search for him, unaware that the bandit Xiao Mei has also fallen for Li Yue. Their intertwined love quadrangle explores themes of sacrifice, devotion and selfless love.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider's look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang's popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his son's arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women only give birth to baby girls and do so by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor's sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, it's cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed The Invincible Fist is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang's. On the Chang's farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrate's daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. However, Lin soon discovers that another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Finally, Lin battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor's death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Lo's brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hu's house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hu's pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Qi Ming Xing, an assassin of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to quit the clan. When hunted by the clan, he is saved by Swordsman Zhuo Yi Fan. Zhuo accidentally discovers that Qi is the killer of his wife, but forgives him after knowing Qi's guilt over her death. The two finally team up to destroy the evil clan.

programme.title: Forbidden Tales of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment, and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gambler's apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: Return Of The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy House of 72 tenants, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: THE AMOROUS LOTUS PAN
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband's playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma ends when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them, he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.desc: The Legend Of Tarzan - A new live-action adventure from director David Yates (Harry Potter films) brings Edgar Rice Burroughs' legendary character back to the big screen. It's been years since the man once known as Tarzan (Alexander Skarsgard --True Blood) left the jungles of Africa behind for a gentrified life as John Clayton III, Lord Greystoke, with his beloved wife, Jane (Margot Robbie -- The Wolf of Wall Street) at his side. Now, he has been invited back to the Congo to serve as a trade emissary of Parliament, unaware that he is a pawn in a deadly convergence of greed and revenge, masterminded by the Belgian, Captain Leon Rom (Oscar winner Christoph Waltz). But those behind the murderous plot have no idea what they are about to unleash.

programme.title: I KNOW WHAT YOU DID LAST SUMMER
programme.desc: When five friends inadvertently cause a deadly car accident, they cover up their involvement and make a pact to keep it a secret rather than face the consequences. A year later, their past comes back to haunt them and they're forced to confront a horrifying truth: someone knows what they did last summer...and is hell-bent on revenge. As one by one the friends are stalked by a killer, they discover this has happened before, and they turn to two survivors of the legendary Southport Massacre of 1997 for help.

programme.title: PASSENGERS
programme.desc: Jennifer Lawrence and Chris Pratt star in a high-stakes adventure about two passengers, Aurora and Jim, onboard a spaceship transporting them to a new life on another planet. The trip takes a deadly turn when their hibernation pods mysteriously wake them 90 years before they reach their destination. As they try to unravel the mystery behind the malfunction, they discover that the ship itself is in grave danger. With the lives of 5,000 sleeping passengers at stake, only Jim and Aurora can save them all.

programme.desc: Love triangle - Min-goo burst into tears after confessing to Yeo-wool about being a victim of school bully back in high school. He gets caught in between Yeo-wool and Seung-bae.

programme.title: My Friends Graduation Ceremony S1 Ep6
programme.desc: At the end of life - Min-goo finds out the truth about Seung-bae's health condition. He discovers a letter written to him by Seung-bae, and learns about the elder's life.

programme.title: My Friends Graduation Ceremony S1 Ep7
programme.desc: I miss you - Seung-bae wakes up to find Min-goo and Yeo-wool waiting by his side. Yeo-wool recounts how she ambushed Min-goo's bully.

programme.title: My Friends Graduation Ceremony S1 Ep8
programme.desc: From the start, till graduation - Min-goo returns home to celebrate his grandmother's birthday. He receives an urgent call saying that Seung-bae is in a critical condition.

programme.title: Don't Call Me Ma'am S1 Ep9
programme.desc: The story of three middle-aged friends who struggle with different challenges in life.

programme.title: The Daily Life Of A Middle-Aged Online Shopper In Another World S1 Ep10
programme.desc: The Story Of Canals - Kenichi takes over the construction of the canal, but it's hard to finish on time when the forest hasn't been cleared.

programme.title: Why Raeliana Ended Up At The Duke's Mansion S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Why Raeliana Cosplayed - Raeliana wakes up in Noah's bed and sees him naked. She runs away and disguises herself as a maid in the mansion.

programme.title: Why Raeliana Ended Up At The Duke's Mansion S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Why Raeliana Handed Her A Handkerchief - It's a custom for women to give men a handkerchief before a Monster Hunt. Noah makes a request to Raeliana on that day.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man S1 Ep76
programme.desc: Key And Noah's Door - Lero kidnaps Lenalee, and the Exorcists follow them into the portal, only to see the infamous Noah's Ark in the sky before being attacked by Akuma.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man S1 Ep77
programme.desc: Skin Bolic's Room - Kanda tells the others to go without him while he fights the Noah and Skin Bolic. In Edo, Marie and Tiedoll continue fighting the combined Akuma.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man S1 Ep78
programme.desc: Taboo, Three Illusions - Kanda activates his Kinki Sangenshiki when the room is near collapse, and Kanda unleashes a final attack on Skin but fails to kill Skin.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man S1 Ep79
programme.desc: Noah's Memory - Noah is revived to fight Kanda once more. Draining more of his life, Kanda restores Mugen momentarily and finally destroys Skin.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man S1 Ep80
programme.desc: Twin's Trap - After Skin's death, the Noah twins set several traps for Allen, who managed to beat these challenges through his experiences with General Cross.

programme.title: My Deer Friend Nokotan S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Get The Sports Festival Done! - Koshitan, the student council president, faces challenges during Hinominami High's sports festival. Will they succeed?

programme.title: My Deer Friend Nokotan S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Blame It On The Spring - Koshitan finds Nokotan in tears at the clubhouse, but it's just hay fever. Now Nokotan looks for ways to cope!

programme.title: My Deer Friend Nokotan S1 Ep11
programme.desc: The Pursuer And The Pursued. - Nokotan feels the "hunter's aura" of legendary Kumatori at Hinominami High. She'll do anything to escape, but what fate awaits her?

programme.title: My Deer Friend Nokotan S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Farewell Nokotan!? Long Live The Deer Club! - In the finale, "Farewell Nokotan!? Long Live the Deer Club!", Koshitan and viewers face the challenge of Nokotan's sudden disappearance.

programme.title: The Daily Life Of A Middle-Aged Online Shopper In Another World S1 Ep8
programme.desc: The Timid Mage - Kenichi holds a barbecue party, Primura proposes to sell the dishes he makes. However, some customers harass them...

programme.title: The Daily Life Of A Middle-Aged Online Shopper In Another World S1 Ep9
programme.desc: So It's A Spider, So What? - Kenichi goes to the dungeon Myare discovered and finds a lot of crystals, but a giant cave spider suddenly appears.

programme.title: The Daily Life Of A Middle-Aged Online Shopper In Another World S1 Ep10
programme.desc: The Story Of Canals - Kenichi takes over the construction of the canal, but it's hard to finish on time when the forest hasn't been cleared.

programme.title: Why Raeliana Ended Up At The Duke's Mansion S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Why Raeliana Handed Her A Handkerchief - It's a custom for women to give men a handkerchief before a Monster Hunt. Noah makes a request to Raeliana on that day.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Summer Demon - Visit the ancient retainer that exorcises evil. Nico's mother, Ibuki, has delivered a new prophecy. Ibuki has an idea who this ancient retainer could be, and tells Nico and her familiars to visit them. They were a bit of a ways away, so Nico, Morihito, Kanshi, Keigo, and Nemu head to the lands where this ancient retainer lives with a summer vacation feeling.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Miharu Kiryu, The Vampire / Missing Parasol / I'm So Glad You're Here - The vampire Miharu Kiryu has moved into the Otogi household. Because he's a vampire, he tends to be a nightowl and lazily doesn't wake up until past noon. On top of that, he needs to siphon life energy to survive, so he immediately gets some from Morihito after waking up. He may not do well in a communal living environment, so will this further power up the chaos in the Otogi house?

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep17
programme.desc: We Got Trapped In A Death Game (but It Sucked) / Long Long A Go Go - A strange mask was attached to their faces, and Morihito, Kanshi, Keigo, and Miharu were transported to an unknown room while they were sleeping. The monitor in the room suddenly turns on and says, My name is Zigzag. Play a game with me. A strange mask, a deep voice-changed voice, and orders from beyond the monitor. They were trapped in a death game, and Nico was a hostage.

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Male Beauty Pageant - The Izu Spring Festival has begun! The members of Peek-a-Boo run an okonomiyaki stall with Iori, Kohei, Chisa, and Azusa helping out. Iori finds himself in a complicated situation when a misunderstanding with Azusa occurs and a rivalry with the tennis club Tinkerbell begins. When Chisa gets nervous and freezes up during the woMen's beauty pageant, Iori and Kohei think of a plan to cheer her on.

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Too Late - Iori and Kohei attend class in their underwear like normal, but everyone glares at them with a bloodthirsty look in their eyes! It's because they heard that Iori and Chisa are dating! Sensing their lives are in danger, Iori and Kohei offer to setup a mixer. They ask Azusa to introduce her friends, but she brings Aina Yoshiwara, the "Cakey" girl from the Izu Spring Festival!

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep6
programme.desc: First Buddy - Iori and Kohei get through their exams by cheating. Meanwhile, PaB throws a welcome party for Aina, their new member. Aina was looking forward to getting a new start to college life, but discovers that no one in the club is normal! Nevertheless, the club members are serious about diving and have the new members learn basic hand signals and dive in pairs. However, Iori gets paired up with Chisa.

On top of that, he needs to siphon life energy to survive, so he immediately gets some from Morihito after waking up. He may not do well in a communal living environment, so will this further power up the chaos in the Otogi house?

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep17
programme.desc: We Got Trapped In A Death Game (but It Sucked) / Long Long A Go Go - A strange mask was attached to their faces, and Morihito, Kanshi, Keigo, and Miharu were transported to an unknown room while they were sleeping. The monitor in the room suddenly turns on and says, My name is Zigzag. Play a game with me. A strange mask, a deep voice-changed voice, and orders from beyond the monitor. They were trapped in a death game, and Nico was a hostage.

programme.title: Why Raeliana Ended Up At The Duke's Mansion S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Why Raeliana Cosplayed - Raeliana wakes up in Noah's bed and sees him naked. She runs away and disguises herself as a maid in the mansion.

programme.title: Why Raeliana Ended Up At The Duke's Mansion S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Why Raeliana Handed Her A Handkerchief - It's a custom for women to give men a handkerchief before a Monster Hunt. Noah makes a request to Raeliana on that day.

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Male Beauty Pageant - The Izu Spring Festival has begun! The members of Peek-a-Boo run an okonomiyaki stall with Iori, Kohei, Chisa, and Azusa helping out. Iori finds himself in a complicated situation when a misunderstanding with Azusa occurs and a rivalry with the tennis club Tinkerbell begins. When Chisa gets nervous and freezes up during the woMen's beauty pageant, Iori and Kohei think of a plan to cheer her on.

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Too Late - Iori and Kohei attend class in their underwear like normal, but everyone glares at them with a bloodthirsty look in their eyes! It's because they heard that Iori and Chisa are dating! Sensing their lives are in danger, Iori and Kohei offer to setup a mixer. They ask Azusa to introduce her friends, but she brings Aina Yoshiwara, the "Cakey" girl from the Izu Spring Festival!

programme.title: Grand Blue S1 Ep6
programme.desc: First Buddy - Iori and Kohei get through their exams by cheating. Meanwhile, PaB throws a welcome party for Aina, their new member. Aina was looking forward to getting a new start to college life, but discovers that no one in the club is normal! Nevertheless, the club members are serious about diving and have the new members learn basic hand signals and dive in pairs. However, Iori gets paired up with Chisa.

programme.title: The Daily Life Of A Middle-Aged Online Shopper In Another World S1 Ep8
programme.desc: The Timid Mage - Kenichi holds a barbecue party, Primura proposes to sell the dishes he makes. However, some customers harass them...

programme.title: The Daily Life Of A Middle-Aged Online Shopper In Another World S1 Ep9
programme.desc: So It's A Spider, So What? - Kenichi goes to the dungeon Myare discovered and finds a lot of crystals, but a giant cave spider suddenly appears.

programme.title: The Daily Life Of A Middle-Aged Online Shopper In Another World S1 Ep10
programme.desc: The Story Of Canals - Kenichi takes over the construction of the canal, but it's hard to finish on time when the forest hasn't been cleared.

programme.desc: Leopard Olimba finds a mate, but fortunes turn against the lions. Extreme flooding leads to disaster for the hyena clan, and the time has come for leopard Mutima to leave.

programme.desc: Series 5, Episode 9 - The five pairs meet for the first time since returning home.

programme.title: Patrick Aryee's Wild World S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bison - Join Patrick in the Great Plains of North America, as he explores the intricate web that connects grasses and dung beetles to bison and the grizzly bear.

programme.title: China's Wild Guangdong S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Mountains - In northern Guangdong, majestic mountain ranges are home to a dazzling array of wildlife, Silver Pheasants, Chinese Pangolins, Black Kites, Chinese Giant Salamanders, and an entirely new species of cave gecko.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Aurora - The largest of all of Earth's displays stretches across thousands of kilometres in the night sky: the Aurora Borealis. The arctic wilderness of Northern Sweden is one of the best places to see it.

programme.title: Amazing Railway Adventures with Nick Knowles S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Morocco - Nick's train leaves from Tangier and it's a special one, Al Boraq, which speeds along the high-speed line making its way down the west coast. At its fastest Al Boraq reaches nearly 200 mph and is run entirely on wind power. The ambition is to run Morocco's entire railway system on green energy within the next two years.

programme.desc: Crowded Continent - In the planet's most densely populated continent, animals live at extremely close quarters with people, from tigers making a home in town to elephants stopping traffic for food.

programme.title: Primates S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Secrets of Survival - Revealing the extraordinary strategies monkeys, apes and lemurs use to survive in the most unexpected places, from snow-capped mountains to the open savannah.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S5 Ep1
programme.desc: Besieged By Sharks - Adventurer Cyril Chauquet seeks out the most colossal and dangerous underwater creatures in the world. Cyril heads to Polynesia to catch a legendary fish known to the locals as the Uruati, but he isn't prepared for the incredible number of sharks lurking below the waters.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild: Meet the Family S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Secrets of Success - The secrets of canid success and their incredible strategies for survival, from leaping jackals to sneezing African wild dogs, and gray foxes that climb trees.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Bigness - Griff Rhys Jones starts his Canadian journey in Newfoundland where he goes looking for moose.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Bank Card - Hannah Fry reveals the miraculous technologies that define the modern world.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Iceland: Fire - Learn about the world's largest volcanic island, a lone and rugged place where steam escapes, water explodes, and new ground is born every day. See how fire and ice collide in a battle that makes this the most geologically powerful island on earth.

programme.title: Wild Tales From The Farm S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hunkering Down - Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumn's final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: Macaque Island S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Young Up-Start - Explore the lush treed cityscape where fluffy male Matnoor rules over the 30-member-strong Street Troop with an iron fist. Then meet Aarav, the old alpha who oversees the wilder Hill Troop. Which will up-and-comer Loci challenge for the crown?

programme.title: Macaque Island S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Grass is Greener - Go on a junk-food-fuelled urban holiday with the Street Troop, then watch the Hill Troop's invasion of their turf turn sour. Monitor the Sisterhood's plot to kidnap Sara's baby before newly minted alpha Loci discovers his old rival is back in town.

programme.title: Macaque Island S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Clash of the Alphas - Stand back when a brawl erupts after the Street Troop finds the Hill Troop on their turf. Assess Matnoor's poor parenting skills, see alpha wannabe Ajit make his move, then cool off as a heat wave pushes everyone to share the wealth in the forest.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Into the Heat - Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clan's symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkat's alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Platypus Predicament - Stand by as rescue officers use a technique called flagging to nab a koala with dangerously inflamed eyes. Soothe burned possum feet with vet Tim, then shadow vet Karina as she examines a half-drowned platypus before referring him to a specialist.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Turtle Trouble - Juggle the demands of caring for sick koala joeys with vet Claire, then see what it takes to save a squirrel glider caught in barbed wire. Take care of an exhausted owl and get a big surprise when vet Tim X-rays a turtle that was struck by a car.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Deadly Intruders - Dash across southeast Queensland as breeding and snake-catching season ramp up. Watch Adele and Mick go up against an eastern brown, the second deadliest snake in the world, while Stu and Liv tangle with a carpet python.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Snake Face Off - Launch into spring's snake surge with Liv and Stu, who intercept two male brown snakes duelling for mating rights at a construction site. Stand back as Dan and Jess rescue chickens from a python, and Mick and Adele hunt for a rogue green tree snake.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Reptile Runabout - Weave through Queensland's coastal chaos, where Jess faces her fears chasing a lace monitor lizard up a tree with an active beehive. Watch Stu cut a trapped eastern brown out of a fence and see Mick hunt a slippery python for terrified homeowners.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hot and Bothered - Dive into tight spaces, underneath hot houses, and into tense rescue situations as the catchers confront a six-foot-long, highly venomous brown snake. Then watch Stu and Liv relocate a coastal python threatening the safety of a homeowner's pets.

programme.title: Survival Of The Beast S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Desert-Adapted Elephant - Trek across the Namibian desert with the bush elephant and learn how it keeps its cool in a place with little food or shade. Discover how this giant consumes specific plants, digs wells, and hikes endless dunes in a quest to find precious water.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Saltwater Crocodile - Navigate a mangrove forest in Borneo with the saltwater crocodile, which is perfectly suited to life among the watery roots. Discover how this reptile uses the environment to regulate its temperature and why its epic patience makes it a super hunter.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Orangutan - Investigate the art of nest making with the jungle's master builder: the orangutan. Shadow Max as he tries to escape the insect-filled floor of the Borneo rainforest and takes inspiration from this solitary primate's natural engineering prowess.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Platypus Predicament - Stand by as rescue officers use a technique called flagging to nab a koala with dangerously inflamed eyes. Soothe burned possum feet with vet Tim, then shadow vet Karina as she examines a half-drowned platypus before referring him to a specialist.

programme.title: Survival Of The Beast S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Desert-Adapted Elephant - Trek across the Namibian desert with the bush elephant and learn how it keeps its cool in a place with little food or shade. Discover how this giant consumes specific plants, digs wells, and hikes endless dunes in a quest to find precious water.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Saltwater Crocodile - Navigate a mangrove forest in Borneo with the saltwater crocodile, which is perfectly suited to life among the watery roots. Discover how this reptile uses the environment to regulate its temperature and why its epic patience makes it a super hunter.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Orangutan - Investigate the art of nest making with the jungle's master builder: the orangutan. Shadow Max as he tries to escape the insect-filled floor of the Borneo rainforest and takes inspiration from this solitary primate's natural engineering prowess.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Southeast Asia - With real-life dueling dragons, giant sumo-wrestling beetles, street-fighting monkeys, and sea turtles that play king of the hill - on top of another sea turtle, Southeast Asia boasts a wide range of wildlife warriors.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Born to Be Wild - Trouble brews when the team makes the final attempt to reunite reluctant mother Dilla with her new baby Delilah. And Alba, the world's only known albino orangutan, amazes her friends with her unique approach to termite foraging.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dragon Mountain: Surviving the Summit - South Africa's Drakensberg is one of the continent's most impressive landscapes. It is home to sharp climatic and ecological gradients as physical conditions change for both land-based creatures and the Raptors that swirl in the skies above.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lake Manyara National Park - In north Tanzania, towering mountains line a dramatic valley. Enriched by ancient volcanoes, its slopes provide a variety of habitats for life to thrive and its great centerpiece holds water through even the driest of times.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Clean Up Crew - Winter in Marakele National Park is one of the scarcest, but also most plentiful, times of the year. See how a giraffe's demise becomes a source of life for the region's vultures, whose survival depends on the decaying flesh of animals like these.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Fantastic Frogs - Cape Town, South Africa is home to twenty types of frogs, but many are threatened by urban development. Meet a variety of the region's species as we follow western leopard toads on their tenuous journey to breed in the city's shrinking wetlands.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Elephant Story - Once superabundant, African Elephant populations have declined drastically due to hunting. Get an in-depth look into the lives of the most powerful land mammals on the planet, and see what parks like Addo and Tembe are doing to preserve their future.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Iceland: Ice - Tour an island built by volcanoes, but sculpted by ice. About 1.5 million years ago, a sheet of ice descended from the north and covered the land. Today, massive glaciers continue to carve marine cliffs and cut down mountains.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the season's fury.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to the planet's biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africa's east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Wild Coast of South Africa - The Wild Coast of South Africa stretches for 170 miles. Here, the waters of the Indian and the Atlantic converge, forcing powerful waves towards the shoreline. This is where the Mozambique-based manta ray researcher Andrea Marshall hopes to conduct her first-ever manta ray expedition within South Africa's borders...

programme.title: Great Blue Wild S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Save the Giants - The wild coastline of Mozambique stretches along more than 1,600 miles - an area teeming with a diversity of marine life. Some of the world's largest filter feeders are attracted to this nutrient-rich water. But even these large creatures are defenceless against reckless overfishing. Two of Mozambique's leading marine researchers, Andrea Marshall and Nakia Cullain, set out to find one of the ocean's most secretive animals and protect its most well known, before its too late.

programme.title: Kingdom Of The Tide
programme.desc: Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. It's a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Oceans - Dive to the darkest depths of the sea to uncover the ocean's most mysterious inhabitants. Journey across vast stretches of open water with humpback whales, then wander down to the ocean floor to witness breathtaking bioluminescence.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical - Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the region's dark side.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Seasonal - Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Water Worlds - Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Wild Coast of South Africa - The Wild Coast of South Africa stretches for 170 miles. Here, the waters of the Indian and the Atlantic converge, forcing powerful waves towards the shoreline. This is where the Mozambique-based manta ray researcher Andrea Marshall hopes to conduct her first-ever manta ray expedition within South Africa's borders...

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Usa - The USA is big on flash and spectacle. Bighorn rams rattle the mountaintops. Brown bears battle, desperate to fatten up for winter. Sharp-tailed grouse shake their tail-feathers on the dance floor. Wild stallions rumble with beauty and grace.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Contend with the challenges of the rainy season, which turns everything green and spoils the lions' camouflage. Watch Einstein fail to make new connections and weigh the pros and cons when Keeza and her cub are kidnapped by rival male Mad-Eye Moody.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Family Dynamics - Say hello to a season of plenty as flood waters recede and vast herds of prey return to the Chobe's banks. Watch Keeza and her cub make a break for it while Caller and Tom Tom brawl with their enemies, then cheer when Einstein finally finds a mate.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Deadly Intruders - Dash across southeast Queensland as breeding and snake-catching season ramp up. Watch Adele and Mick go up against an eastern brown, the second deadliest snake in the world, while Stu and Liv tangle with a carpet python.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Snake Face Off - Launch into spring's snake surge with Liv and Stu, who intercept two male brown snakes duelling for mating rights at a construction site. Stand back as Dan and Jess rescue chickens from a python, and Mick and Adele hunt for a rogue green tree snake.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry from the Mist
programme.desc: Race the clock with biologists as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlock the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponder whether their cries will continue to be summer's soundtrack or go silent forever.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Pushed to the Limits - Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkat's strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Brought Back from the Brink - Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat's teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Contend with the challenges of the rainy season, which turns everything green and spoils the lions' camouflage. Watch Einstein fail to make new connections and weigh the pros and cons when Keeza and her cub are kidnapped by rival male Mad-Eye Moody.

programme.desc: Pushed to the Limits - Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkat's strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Brought Back from the Brink - Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bat's teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Contend with the challenges of the rainy season, which turns everything green and spoils the lions' camouflage. Watch Einstein fail to make new connections and weigh the pros and cons when Keeza and her cub are kidnapped by rival male Mad-Eye Moody.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Family Dynamics - Say hello to a season of plenty as flood waters recede and vast herds of prey return to the Chobe's banks. Watch Keeza and her cub make a break for it while Caller and Tom Tom brawl with their enemies, then cheer when Einstein finally finds a mate.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Deadly Intruders - Dash across southeast Queensland as breeding and snake-catching season ramp up. Watch Adele and Mick go up against an eastern brown, the second deadliest snake in the world, while Stu and Liv tangle with a carpet python.

programme.title: Aussie Snake Wranglers: Deadly Pursuit S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Snake Face Off - Launch into spring's snake surge with Liv and Stu, who intercept two male brown snakes duelling for mating rights at a construction site. Stand back as Dan and Jess rescue chickens from a python, and Mick and Adele hunt for a rogue green tree snake.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry from the Mist
programme.desc: Race the clock with biologists as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlock the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponder whether their cries will continue to be summer's soundtrack or go silent forever.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat S1 Ep3
programme.desc: From Bean to Bar - Rachel explores chocolate's versatility. She mixes it with savoury in a polpette penne, and in Stockholm she learns about pairing drink with chocolate.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 1 - Rick braves the notoriously wild Atlantic waters to learn about the ancient fishing method of handlining at Sennen Cove off Land's End. The catch of the day is some deliciously plump pollock, which Rick uses to make the ultimate fish pie for the head gardener of Tresillian House, John Harris.

programme.title: Donal Skehan: Home Cook S1 Ep8

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Poll Position - King Julien learns that 99% of the lemurs love him, so he makes it his mission to find and convert his one "hater."

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep1
programme.desc: First Flight: Part 1 - Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep2
programme.desc: First Flight: Part 2 - Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Big Trouble in Panda Village - The kids must leave Po to escape into the forest and head back to Panda Village to prepare against Jindiao

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Secrets Lost to Shadow - The kids meet an unlikely ally when trying to find Po

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Copy Cat - When Puss accidentally agrees to ride for both Artephius and the orphans in the annual San Lorenzo horse race, his twin Puss Dos enters the race.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Coin Toss - Dulcinea must save the town from thieves when Puss and the townspeople become obsessed with a gambling game and forget to protect San Lorenzo.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Tales from the Fox's Tails - When a mysterious creature keeps stealing people's prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yi's prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Yi's LiLi-est Fan - While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who's positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew's pursuits. When Everest doesn't return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi's intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep24
programme.desc: DJ Catnip Gets His Groove Back - Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats' everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Kitty Fairy Gets Sick - When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy make her some delicious dandelion soup and while she rests, they take care of her Garden. With the help of all the Gabby Cats, they water the Singing Flowers, help the Rainbow Kitty Bushes regain their color, and sing some fussy Itty Bitty Blossoms a lullaby. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spaceship - The dollhouse delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden before Floyd (who thinks it's the best kitty toy ever!) gets his paws on it!

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep4
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure - climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Parental Stridence - When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Flopping of the Bullruses - Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Follow the Lightning: Part 1 - Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to D'Angelo and Alex.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Follow the Lightning: Part 2 - Tom and the riders help Thunder, who is seeking revenge against the dragons that chased off his family.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Fire Escape - Tom hatches an unorthodox plan to use a monstrous Nightmare to test Alex's new fire suits that endangers the secret of dragons.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harold's latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.desc: Twintuition - When the Twins journey to the Northern Markets to fix their prized mace, they end up stumbling onto a secret project by Viggo and the Dragon Hunters.

programme.desc: Bloodlines - Keith is sent on a mission to destroy a weapon before Galra forces can find it

programme.desc: Cave New World - When the adults exclude the kids from their adult-only cave, the kids make their own much cooler cave, soon making the adults want to switch caves.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Thunk Tank - When a freak lightning strike turns Thunk into a genius, Phil is thrilled to have someone likeminded on the farm, until the farm residents start asking Thunk for help with problems on the farm instead of him.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Enter The Fanaloka - The evil genius Karl sets out to destroy King Julien. When both Clover and Maurice are captured, King Julien must save them from his new nemesis.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Empty Is The Head - Exhausted from settling his subjects' disputes, King Julien replaces himself with a dummy king so he can play hooky, unwittingly sparking a rebellion.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Hole New World - Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own - Wu and Wei.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Dragon Club - Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D'Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D'Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Out of the Cave and Onto Thin Ice - After a shocking revelation, Po is determined to get his chi back and Jing decides to face Jindiao

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Return of the Four Constellations - The kids go to the Spirit Realm and meet the Original Four Constellations in the hopes of learning how to defeat Jindiao

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 Ep35
programme.desc: King Pickles - When Kid Pickles is feeling down on his birthday, Puss and Artephius create a magical scroll that names Kid Pickles as heir to the San Lorenzo throne.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 Ep36
programme.desc: Pirate Booty - After pirates invade San Lorenzo searching for mystical treasure, Puss leads them on the hunt, hoping his share will defend against the Bloodwolf

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Qilin-mania - Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yi's building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this Qilin isn't an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Shack Attack - "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot Qilin and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Gabby Gets The Hiccups - The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hamster Kitties - When 6 adorable hamster kitties get loose in the dollhouse, Gabby, Pandy and Baby Box head out to look for them. Along the way, Baby Box learns a lot about hamster kitties, which convinces Mama Box to let them live in the Craft Room.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Kitty School - When Gabby unboxes a school notebook and lunch box, it's Kitty School Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy head to different classes held by the Gabby Cats to learn and live a day in the life of a student.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Remote Control - Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he's been missing - real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.desc: Shops - Playing 'Shops' is the best game ever for Bluey and her friends - if they can ever get started! With Bluey questioning the rules and changing who's who, they might be here all day!

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Carrot the Champion - A sporty Brussel Sprout, who's training Carrot to do the Ultimate Flip Kick, is Evil Pea in disguise. Evil Pea captures Supertato, but Carrot finally masters the flip kick and rescues him.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Big Ben, England - The Go Jetters visit London on New Year's Eve, but Big Ben is missing! To the Vroomster!

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Cappadocia, Turkey - A game of hide and seek threatens to topple the fairy chimneys of Cappadocia in Turkey.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Chocolate Hills, Philippines - Greedy Grandmaster Glitch has been gorging on chocolate and wants more! The Grimbots discover a place called the Chocolate Hills on Bohol Island in the Philippines and take him there.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Go Jetter Heroes: Polar Explorers - When Glitch and Kyan race to the south pole, Glitch's Grimbots steal the pole's marker.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep2
programme.desc: Chucklesome Trucks - When Rebecca works with the Troublesome Trucks, everyone expects the worst, but she defies everyone's expectations and has a very amusing day.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep7
programme.desc: The Other Big Engine - While working on the Brazilian Railway, Thomas Meets Gustavo, another big blue engine who reminds him of Gordon back home.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep15
programme.desc: First Day on Sodor! - Darcy the tunnel boring machine makes some mistakes on her first day, but she soon makes up for it when everyone sees what she can really do.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep3
programme.desc: The Great Little Railway Show - When a Railway Show for little engines comes to Sodor, an overly excited Percy finally sees his chance to shine.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep6
programme.desc: Shankar's Makeover - There's a fancy dress competition on the railways and while Thomas and the others are excited, Shankar doesn't want to join in.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep12
programme.desc: Thomas and the Inventor's Workshop - Thomas is asked to help find the inventor, Ruth, a new home and workshop on Sodor.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep51
programme.desc: Round and Round - Jeanie says going round in circles won't help find a missing key, but Monty isn't so sure.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep20
programme.desc: It's Time to Explore the Park - JoJo and Gran Gran have a relaxing yoga class with Auntie Dee before using their senses to enjoy a day at the park.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep19
programme.desc: It's Time to Make Jewellery - JoJo loves Gran Gran's jewellery, especially the brooch from Great-Gran Gran. She's also excited to make her own special treasures, just like Captain Chloe.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Beach Break - Sarah & Duck are spending a day at the beach, aiming to build some sand animals.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Woolly Memories - Scarf Lady's old film reels get themselves in a tangle, so Sarah and Duck decide to recreate the footage.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep12
programme.desc: Diesel Glows Away - When notorious Diesel hides from the other engines, his plans backfire and he gets a surprise on Sodor.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Postman - When Mum and Dad have a disagreement, Bluey makes Dad write a love letter to Mum to make up. Bluey must find a way to play Ground's Lava with Bingo and deliver the letter to Mum, without squabbling.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Quiet Game - Bluey and Bingo are playing The Quiet Game and won't use words to tell Dad which toy to buy for Muffin. At his wit's end, Dad recruits new store clerk Alfie to help interpret the girls' miming.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Mr Monkeyjocks - Dad thinks the kids have too many toys and suggests a chuck out. To save their beloved Mr Monkeyjocks from getting the chop, Bluey and Bingo must prove he is special.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes, instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk, Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: Akele Hum Akele Tum

programme.title: Tejas

programme.title: Jabariya Jodi
programme.desc: Abhay, a righteous thug, forcefully kidnaps grooms who demand dowry and later marries them off. Babli, his childhood sweetheart, re-enters his life and changes his priorities.
